subject: Re: Hair By Phd Website Changes
preview: Hi Sarkis, Most welcome and we are standing by.

full_threads.body:
Hi Sarkis, 

Most welcome and we are standing by.

Thanks Chris. I have some changes that need to be done for online booking. Will be in touch shortly.

Cheers,

Sarkis

Hi Sarkis, 

Great news, confirming we have added the information as requested, you can see the updates here: https://hairbyphd.com.au/privacy-policy/

In terms of providing insights as to whether it complies, that's more of a question for you and possibly your legal team.

Hi @rica, 
Please see the update request below from Sarkis.

If you can add the missing info, you can assign me to to reply. 

Thanks!

Hi Chris and team,

I have just been going through the website setting up online booking through our point of sale provider. I just had a look at our privacy policy and have seen that our last developer left out some crucial details. Please update the following.

Business name. Hair by Phd
Address. 35-37 Phillip St, Parramatta. NSW 2150
email address. info@hairbyphd.com.au
Phone 02 96354721
www.hairbyphd.com.au

Please check that this page complies to requirements for a policy such as this.

Thank you.

Cheers,

Sarkis
Logged a total of 30mins to Harvest

Hi Sarkis, 

You are most welcome.

Confirming a new Instagram embed was created and added to: https://hairbyphd.com.au/curly-hair/

@joel 

Can I please have your assistance with the below?
1. https://hairbyphd.com.au/curly-hair/ to use a dedicated Instagram embed
Instagram embed code - sent in Slack. 
2. All other remaining pages to use existing. 

Chris 15 mins to prepare embed codes.

Hi Chris,

Thank you for this. All looks good from my end.

One more request please. Can we have all Instagram posts with the hashtag #hairbyphdcurly feed through on the Curly hair page?

Cheers,

Sarkis
@rica  Please add a further (Time:15mins) for me to prepare the Google Business Profile data.

Hi Sarkis, 

I hope all is well. Confirming the following updates have been completed:

1. Afterpay has been removed
2. https://hairbyphd.com.au/curly-hair/ stylists names have been removed.
3. The mobile device version of the website now features 3 location call buttons, these are sticky meaning the appear on every page. 
This approach ensures the desktop version of the site remains uncluttered. P
4. https://hairbyphd.com.au/offers/seamless1-extensions-package/ before and after images have been updated. 

We also took the opportunity to link your footer addresses to their respective Google Business Profiles. This helps with users who want directions to one of your locations. It also helps to show a relationship between the Google Business Profiles and your website. 

When convenient, please review the changes and let us know of any further updates.

@chris All good onthe changes

https://hairbyphd.com.au/

@rica (Time: 60mins)

Hi Sarkis, 

Thanks for the email. We have these updates pending with our development team and expect to share an update with you tomorrow. 

I'm away from the office tomorrow and can catch up early next week to chat about the performance side of things.

Hey @joel, I'd like to a little extra for Sarkis as he is a new client. 

1. /home
Footer: update address to have a URL for Google Business Profile
Parramatta: https://maps.app.goo.gl/QHHir5mMZM5Snbzy5
Carlingford: https://maps.app.goo.gl/tk1i9jN5tnfjTxMD8
Camden: https://maps.app.goo.gl/Uvkmyp7WYdc1gJt28

2. /contact
Update map embeds to the following:

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

Hi Chris,

Hope you are well.

I would like to make a few minor changes to our website. I have considered Pointdot's proposal to rebuild the website, however I just don't have the budget at the moment. I will look at this again early in the new year. In the meantime please see minor adjustments below. If you have any suggestions to help improve the performance please let me know.

1. Please remove Afterpay as a payment option from our online shop.
2. On the Curly Hair page, can you please remove the stylists name on the right hand side of page where the locations are listed. Please check the Instagram feed on this page as there are no images coming through. Also can you make the phone numbers interactive so clients can just tap the number and it can give an option to call.
3. As most inquiries are by phone can we have a call now action but on every page to make it easier for clients to call. We currently have Book now which takes them to an online booking request? This is already available on the front page but would like it throughout the website.
4. Can you please change the before and after images on the Seamless1 Extensions page to the ones attached to the email?

As mentioned above, any other changes we can make to the site to make it more user friendly for potential clients please advise. If you need any clarification with the above please let me know.

Cheers,

Sarkis
--
